languages.text: "Я..." {n}Маршал застывает с открытым ртом, а потом звучно его закрывает и тихо, удивительно человечно произносит:{/n} "Этого требовала служба. Я понимаю, что вы вправе гневаться на меня, но... давайте не будем делать дела Империума заложниками вашего ко мне дурного отношения. Прошу".

"I..." {n}The Marshal freezes with his mouth open, then closes it with a snap and says quietly, with surprising sincerity,{/n} "My duty demanded it. I understand you have the right to be angry with me, but... we must not let the interests of the Imperium suffer as a result of your antipathy. I beg you."
languages.original_text: "Я..." {n}Маршал застывает с открытым ртом, а потом звучно его закрывает и тихо, удивительно человечно произносит:{/n} "Этого требовала служба. Я понимаю, что вы вправе гневаться на меня, но... давайте не будем делать дела Империума заложниками вашего ко мне дурного отношения. Прошу".

traits.locale_text: "I..." {n}The Marshal freezes with his mouth open, then closes it with a snap and says quietly, with surprising sincerity,{/n} "My duty demanded it. I understand you have the right to be angry with me, but... we must not let the interests of the Imperium suffer as a result of your antipathy. I beg you."

"I..." {n}The Marshal freezes with his mouth open, then closes it with a snap and says quietly, with surprising sincerity,{/n} "My duty demanded it. I understand you have the right to be angry with me, but... we must not let the interests of the Imperium suffer as a result of your antipathy. I beg you."

"I..." {n}The Marshal freezes with his mouth open, then closes it with a snap and says quietly, with surprising sincerity,{/n} "My duty demanded it. I understand you have the right to be angry with me, but... we must not let the interests of the Imperium suffer as a result of your antipathy. I beg you."

"I..." {n}The Marshal freezes with his mouth open, then closes it with a snap and says quietly, with surprising sincerity,{/n} "My duty demanded it. I understand you have the right to be angry with me, but... we must not let the interests of the Imperium suffer as a result of your antipathy. I beg you."

"I..." {n}The Marshal freezes with his mouth open, then closes it with a snap and says quietly, with surprising sincerity,{/n} "My duty demanded it. I understand you have the right to be angry with me, but... we must not let the interests of the Imperium suffer as a result of your antipathy. I beg you."

languages.text: "Ich ..." {n}Der Marschall erstarrt mit offenen Mund, ehe er leise und überraschend ehrlich erklärt {/n} "Das war meine Pflicht. Ich weiß, Ihr habt alles Recht dazu, auf mich wütend zu sein, aber ... die Interessen des Imperiums dürfen nicht unter Eurer Antipathie leiden. Ich flehe Euch an."
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}The Marshal freezes with his mouth open, then closes it with a snap and says quietly, with surprising sincerity,{/n} "My duty demanded it. I understand you have the right to be angry with me, but... we must not let the interests of the Imperium suffer as a result of your antipathy. I beg you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ..." {n}Der Marschall erstarrt mit offenen Mund, ehe er leise und überraschend ehrlich erklärt {/n} "Das war meine Pflicht. Ich weiß, Ihr habt alles Recht dazu, auf mich wütend zu sein, aber ... die Interessen des Imperiums dürfen nicht unter Eurer Antipathie leiden. Ich flehe Euch an."

languages.text: « Je... {n}Le maréchal se fige en ouvrant la bouche, puis la referme dans un claquement et répond à voix basse, avec une sincérité surprenante.{/n} Mon devoir l'exigeait. Vous avez le droit de m'en vouloir, j'en ai bien conscience, mais... ne laissez pas votre antipathie à mon égard nuire aux intérêts de l'Imperium. Je vous en supplie. »
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}The Marshal freezes with his mouth open, then closes it with a snap and says quietly, with surprising sincerity,{/n} "My duty demanded it. I understand you have the right to be angry with me, but... we must not let the interests of the Imperium suffer as a result of your antipathy. I beg you."

traits.locale_text: « Je... {n}Le maréchal se fige en ouvrant la bouche, puis la referme dans un claquement et répond à voix basse, avec une sincérité surprenante.{/n} Mon devoir l'exigeait. Vous avez le droit de m'en vouloir, j'en ai bien conscience, mais... ne laissez pas votre antipathie à mon égard nuire aux intérêts de l'Imperium. Je vous en supplie. »

languages.text: 「私は…」{n}将帥は口を開いたまま動きを止めるが、すぐに口を硬く閉じ、驚くほど誠実な口調で静かに言った。{/n}「それが、私の義務でした。あなたが私に怒る権利があることは理解しています。ですが…あなたの反感のせいで帝国の利益が損なわれるようなことがあってはなりません。頼みます」
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}The Marshal freezes with his mouth open, then closes it with a snap and says quietly, with surprising sincerity,{/n} "My duty demanded it. I understand you have the right to be angry with me, but... we must not let the interests of the Imperium suffer as a result of your antipathy. I beg you."

traits.locale_text: 「私は…」{n}将帥は口を開いたまま動きを止めるが、すぐに口を硬く閉じ、驚くほど誠実な口調で静かに言った。{/n}「それが、私の義務でした。あなたが私に怒る権利があることは理解しています。ですが…あなたの反感のせいで帝国の利益が損なわれるようなことがあってはなりません。頼みます」

languages.text: «Yo...». {n}El mariscal se detiene, con la boca abierta, después la cierra bruscamente y, con sorprendente sinceridad, continúa en voz más baja:{/n} «Mi deber lo exigía. Entiendo que tiene derecho a enfadarse conmigo. Pero... no dejemos que los intereses del Imperium sufran por su antipatía. Se lo ruego».
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}The Marshal freezes with his mouth open, then closes it with a snap and says quietly, with surprising sincerity,{/n} "My duty demanded it. I understand you have the right to be angry with me, but... we must not let the interests of the Imperium suffer as a result of your antipathy. I beg you."

traits.locale_text: «Yo...». {n}El mariscal se detiene, con la boca abierta, después la cierra bruscamente y, con sorprendente sinceridad, continúa en voz más baja:{/n} «Mi deber lo exigía. Entiendo que tiene derecho a enfadarse conmigo. Pero... no dejemos que los intereses del Imperium sufran por su antipatía. Se lo ruego».

languages.text: “我……”{n}元帅张着嘴巴，愣在了原地。随后，他猛地合上了嘴，以平静的语气开了口，声音中带着令人惊讶的真诚。{/n}“由于职责所在，我必须这么做。我明白，你有权对我感到愤怒，可……我们不能仅仅因为你的反感，就让帝国的利益受到损害。我恳求你的理解。”
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}The Marshal freezes with his mouth open, then closes it with a snap and says quietly, with surprising sincerity,{/n} "My duty demanded it. I understand you have the right to be angry with me, but... we must not let the interests of the Imperium suffer as a result of your antipathy. I beg you."

traits.locale_text: “我……”{n}元帅张着嘴巴，愣在了原地。随后，他猛地合上了嘴，以平静的语气开了口，声音中带着令人惊讶的真诚。{/n}“由于职责所在，我必须这么做。我明白，你有权对我感到愤怒，可……我们不能仅仅因为你的反感，就让帝国的利益受到损害。我恳求你的理解。”

languages.text: "Ben..." {n}Ağzı açık donakalan Miralay, birden ağzını kapatıp şaşırtıcı bir samimiyetle sakince itirafta bulunuyor.{/n} "Vazife gereği yaptım. Evet, kızmakta haklısınız ama... Antipatiniz yüzünden İmparatorluk'un çıkarlarının zarar görmesine göz yumamazdık. Ne olur anlayın."
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}The Marshal freezes with his mouth open, then closes it with a snap and says quietly, with surprising sincerity,{/n} "My duty demanded it. I understand you have the right to be angry with me, but... we must not let the interests of the Imperium suffer as a result of your antipathy. I beg you."

traits.locale_text: "Ben..." {n}Miralay ağzı açık donakalıyor, sonra birden ağzını kapatıp şaşırtıcı bir samimiyetle sakince itirafta bulunuyor.{/n} "Görev gereği yaptım. Evet, kızmakta haklısınız ama... Antipatiniz yüzünden İmparatorluk'un çıkarlarının zarar görmesine göz yumamazdık. Ne olur anlayın."
